|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S922X (A311D); |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 2 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A73 |cpu1_type2 = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.8 --> |cpu1spd2 = 2.2 GHz<!-- 1.9 --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Rayson;RS1G32L04D2BDS-53BT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8111H; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2022 |estprice = 100 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BS1G8CHR |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S922X (A311D) (ARMv8-A 64-bit) :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A73) @2.2GHz :+ Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.8GHz :NPU: 5.0 TOPS @800MHz *GPU: ''Mali-G52 MP4'' @800MHz (AFBC, DX12, :OpenGL ES3.2, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL 2.0) *Storage: 16GB (eMMC) Flash, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC Card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) RAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB Type-C (OTG) ports *Network: 2x 1GbE port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB (Type-C) :or optional 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M2S ''Banana Pi BPI-M2S'' on '''BPi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/12/20/96-banana-pi-bpi-m2s-amlogic-a311d-s922x-sbc-offers-dual-gbe-optional-poe-and-wifi-5/ ''Banana Pi BPI-M2S Amlogic A311D/S922X SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/hexa-core-banana-pi-bpi-m2s-packs-a-neural-processor-and-dual-lan-for-100/ ''Hexa-core Banana Pi BPI-M2S packs a neural processor and dual LAN'' on '''Lilliputing''']
==See also== {{Project:Network/Banana Pi models}}
